n0:createOracleTypeSpec.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TYPE "HHA_PROD"."ATTEND_TYPE_DTL" as object ( EMP_NO varchar2(200), MONTH_YEAR varchar2(200), P_DATE varchar2(200), ST_ENAME varchar2(200), LEGAL_EMPLOYER varchar2(200), LOC_CODE varchar2(200), COMPINATION varchar2(200), ATTENDANCE_DATE varchar2(200), PATTERN_NAME varchar2(200), TIME_IN varchar2(200), TIME_OUT varchar2(200), TOTAL_HOURS varchar2(200), TOTAL_HOURS_FORMAT varchar2(200), TOTAL_HOURS_EMP varchar2(200), TOTAL_HOURS_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_IN varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_IN_FORMAT varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_IN_EMP varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_IN_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_IN varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_IN_FORMAT varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_IN_EMP varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_IN_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_OUT varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_OUT_FORMAT varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_OUT_EMP varchar2(200), ADDITIONAL_OUT_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_OUT varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_OUT_FORMAT varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_OUT_EMP varchar2(200), SHORTAGE_OUT_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), SCHEDULED_HOURS varchar2(200), SCHEDULED_HOURS_FORMAT varchar2(200), SCHEDULED_HOURS_EMP varchar2(200), SCHEDULED_HOURS_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS_FORMAT varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS_EMP varchar2(200), DEDUCTIBLE_HOURS_EMP_FORMAT varchar2(200), REMARKS varchar2(200), REMARKS1 varchar2(200), TOT_DEDUCTABLE_AM varchar2(200) ) /
